content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> "The last dandelion" what do you think about that caption?

The grounding style would be useful here to explore how "The last dandelion" connects to the visual elements of the droodle and the narrative implications of the title. By examining what aspects of the story and imagery are captured by this caption, we can enhance its connection and ensure it resonates in a surprising way with viewers.
